text: How do YOU deploy your WSGI application?
(and why it is the best way)
There are many ways to skin this cat.
I am currently using apache2 with mod-wsgi, but I can see some potential problems with this.
So how can it be done?
I want to know how you do it, and why it is the best way to do it.
I would absolutely love you to bore me with details about the whats and the whys, application specific stuff, etc.
I will upvote any non-insane answer.
